Bez zastanowienia mogę odpowiedzieć ,że "portal 2" tak samo jak "portal" to najlepsze gry w jakie grałem w życiu.
Fabuła tej serii gier jest po prostu wspaniała.
Zdecydowanie mogę zachęcić do kupna tej gry każdego kto lubi fabularne, przygodowe i łamigłówkowe gry.

Даже спустя 10 лет, даже когда в Ютубе посмотрел полный разбор и заранее знал весь сюжет, даже не смотря на то, что случайно начал игру со 2 главы (когда был на 7), игра мне очень понравилась. И геймплей крутой, и юмор классный,и персонажи тоже(всё это касается исключительно сюжетной кампании)
Güzel beğendim özellikle multiplayerında baya bi zaman durup düşündüğümüz oluyor. Ve şu an 3.70 tl olması çok iyi

Una secuela que mejora todo lo que hizo el original, mejor historia, mejores personajes, mejores puzzles y el humor esta mucho mas refinado que el del 1, hay momentos que te estas muriendo de la risa y otros en donde tienes una rabia de querer que se calle ese maldito tipo... El segundo mejor juego de Valve detrás de Half life 2, excelente jogo.

Portal 2 has always been a game series that I held close to my heart. It was one of the very first games I had ever purchased on Steam.  I finally 100% the game in both Co-op and Story Mode after all of these years and I wish I had done it sooner. 

The physics of this game paired with the amazing comedy of the cast makes for a really fun time! I would recommend this game for any new Steam user and any Science lover! 

9/10

My brain's gotta go take a shit

Portal 2...

Where do I even begin with this one...

For starters, the 3D animation of portal is wonderful, sometimes in games 3D animation can be real hit or miss but in this case I say it was a constant hit! The game assets all look wonderful. The soundtrack is... alright... I mean it works perfectly for the game and really gives of the right vibes, but just in general it's not a OST I would go back and listen to often if at all.

Story gets its own section oh boy. The story was phenomenal! Having the Wheatley bait and switch at the start wasn't something I was expecting but I was pleasantly surprised with him. Taking over Aperture and trying to kill me while I run around with G.L.A.D.O.S in a potato solving puzzles was a'lot more fun than I was expecting.

The Co-op...
Now, this is where the game got good... I'll quickly talk about the story... It was alright I guess. I mean, It's co-op story so I wasn't really expecting much, it was fun to see G.L.A.D.O.S get scared of a bird tho... ANYWAY. I have played through the Co-op 3 times with different people and every time it was enjoyable, so many laughs and good memories thanks to this game so for that I will forever be thankful. Maybe this sais more about my friends than it does the game, but solving puzzles with them was so much fucking fun.

Overall a great game that I would definitely recommend!
Fun on it's own, Fun'er with friends!
iki gram beyin vardı onuda burda yaktık amk

This game is nothing but amazing. Not only the graphics or the gameplay but the people who wrote the characters for Wheatley and GLaDOS deserve a raise. An AI with the intents on murdering humanity to develop a gun that can create wormholes while still having a good sense of humor while on the other hand we have a shy and extremely "smart" Wheatley. If you have the money buy it nothing else to say
Great story, perfect continuation of the first one and I bought it for 1 or 2 euros i dont remember :D
